name: RMN Global Search
tag_list: recruiting-firm, legal-recruiter, staffing, associate, in-house, partner, contract-attorney
overview:
RMN Global Search is a full-service legal search and staffing company headquartered in Atlanta, Georgia with a worldwide client base. We are legal recruiters with a unique ability to identify your needs and conduct a customized search to fulfill them efficiently and effectively. Our recruiters’ commitment to excellence and dedication to the placement of the highest caliber candidates have earned us clients in law firms and in-house legal departments of all sizes and types.

RMN Global Search strives to be exceptional in placing top legal talent in positions that are right for you. Because our focus is on your unique needs, we consider all the aspects of an attorney’s life and your professional objectives as well as your fit for a particular law firm or in-house position. With years of recruiting experience placing the best legal professionals, our attorney-led agency always considers our candidates’ best interests.

We specialize in the recruitment and placement of top professionals for the legal industry for the following roles:

Partner Recruiting
Associate Recruiting
In-House Attorneys
Contract Attorneys
New Firm Start-Ups and Firm Expansions
Firm Mergers and Acquisitions

Excellence in law practice starts with exceptional placements and those begin with RMN Global Search.
